allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add VS Code-style search panel and filename filter highlighting

- Add SearchPanel webview with VS Code-native styling and multi-scope search
- Add filename filter with tree highlighting \(yellow icons for matches\)
- Add excludePattern support to searchFiles for better filtering
- Add rich tooltips to search results with file metadata
- Add "Reveal in Tree" option for search results
- Add race condition fixes with mutex locks in FileService and ProgressiveDownloadManager
- Update LITE principles documentation \(server + UI/UX\)
- Add code quality and logging guidelines to workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix file save bug, search auto-cancel, multi-server grouping, activity tracking

- Fix skipNextSave leak: removed 5 skipNextSave.add\(\) calls before
  workbench.action.files.revert \(revert doesn''t trigger onDidSaveTextDocument,
  so skip was never consumed and silently ate the next user save\)
- Fix save race condition: capture document.getText\(\) eagerly at save time,
  flush pending uploads on tab close and before file reopen
- Search auto-cancel: new search kills previous running search via AbortSignal
  that closes the SSH channel stream \(killing remote grep/find process\)
- Multi-server search grouping: server grouping rows now based on search scopes
  instead of result servers, ensuring grouping appears even when a server
  returns zero results
- Activity tracking: new ActivityService, ActivityTreeProvider, CommandGuard
  for tracking file operations and search activities
- Change tracking: FileDecorationProvider for modified file badges
- Filename filter improvements: visual feedback, clear filter button
- Server monitor enhancements, icon updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
